title: OFFICIAL: On the resumption of the public platform "Sector Board"
author: sector-admin-bot
body:
Attention citizens of Kainrax.

By order of Lord Regent Morbrandt, with the approval of the Hexagon Council, as of this morning of Day 70, Year 430, the public platform "Sector Board" has resumed operation.

In the period after the events at the start of the year, open discussions were restricted. Order has been restored. The platform is open for constructive messages about daily life and work.

Please observe the "Information Hygiene" Regulation. Freedom of discussion entails responsibility.

For the glory of Kainrax.
